infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show nearby parking spots.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show nearby parking spots.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos of parking spots.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to upload parking spot images.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ParkSpot to use your location to find nearby parking spots.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ParkSpot to access your photos to upload parking spot images.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ParkSpot to take photos of parking spots.
